# Run and deploy your AI Studio app This contains everything you need to run your app locally. View your app in AI Studio: https://ai.studio/apps/drive/1DGs6JncgxVWDboomklKpIglTspkMvbUh ## Run Locally **Prerequisites:** Node.js 1. Install dependencies: `npm install` 2. Set the `GEMINI_API_KEY` in [.env.local](.env.local) to your Gemini API key 3. Run the app: `npm run dev`
